string-array.name: help_faq
string-array.item: FAQ 1: How user and/or group management works in Peon?
FAQ 2: How can I manage groups?

string-array.name: help_ans
string-array.item: Answer: There are some stages in Peon in which the capabilities of a role of subscriber is distributed. \n1. You can manage only groups if you are an organization/institute admin, such as adding new groups. \n2. You can manage only users (group members) if you are a group admin, such as inviting a user to the group. 3. You can not manage users unless you are invited to be a group admin by current group admin.

Answer: You can manage group by going to the \'Create Group\' menu to create a new group. Also, you can view current groups in \'View Groups\' menu. Currently, deleting and/or editing a group is not available in Peon. You can contact us if you willing to do so. Note that: \'Create Group\' and \'View Groups\' menu are ONLY available to an organization/institute admin.
